contentfulPagePressRelease.title: UCL Qatar Public Lecture Series: Escaping the Shadow of Enver Hoxha

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Event: UCL Qatar Public Lecture Series

Title: Escaping the shadow of Enver Hoxha

By: Richard Hodges, President of The American University of Rome

Date: Monday 26 January 2015

Time: 6.00pm – Reception to follow

Location: Auditorium, Georgetown Building, Education City

For registration and information please contact events.qatar@ucl.ac.uk or 40002644
This lecture reviews the excavations and cultural heritage experiences in post-communist Albania, as the Butrint Foundation transformed an unknown Greco-Roman port into a UNESCO world heritage site that today attracts 100,000 tourists per year.

This lecture describes the positive and negative views of practicing cultural heritage by a pivotal generation, new to the business.
